Name: Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection occurrences across all cases
Percentage of process variants that include SW-Initial Reviewer Selection
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all cases

Name: Number of times SW-Initial Reviewer Selection is directly followed by SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities for cases where activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection activities that occur before any reviewer-related reminder (e.g., Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 or 2)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all cases where 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' does not happen

Name: Frequency of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection in cases that eventually lead to SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection relative to SW-Awaiting AE Assignment
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment'

Name: Number of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection events that are followed within 7 days by a reviewer assignment activity (e.g., SW-AE Assign Reviewers)
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities for cases where activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection that appears in variants ending with an acceptance decision (e.g., SW-EIC Accept or RW-EIC Accept)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Frequency of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection compared to other initial-phase activities such as SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion or Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases where SW-Initial Reviewer Selection occurs only once versus multiple times
Metric: the average of the function base == 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'

Name: Number of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection activities that precede at least one instance of SW-Reviewer Declined
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection that is followed by a due-date escalation activity (e.g., SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week'

Name: Frequency of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection in manuscripts that undergo major revision (e.g., SW-EIC Major Revision)
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Major Revision' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection occurring after Plagiarism Originality Report Completed but before any reviewer invitation activity
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed'
